item.title: UEC
item.description: score:-27 Chances: Uranium prices hit $100 briefly, and may rise as high as $140, sparking a bull market in nuclear fuel. The surge in uranium prices and the deal reached by COP28 indicate increasing exposure to the metal, benefiting investors. Amir Adnani’s speech at COP28 on sustainable uranium mining and the growing role of carbon-free nuclear power signals potential market growth.
